import { useState } from 'react'; import { database } from '../firebase' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const footerNavigation = { discover: [ { name: 'Courses', href: '/enroll' }, { name: 'Events', href: '/events' }, { name: 'Resources', href: '/resources' }, ], support: [ { name: 'Join our Team', href: '/team' }, { name: 'Sponsor', href: '' }, { name: 'Donate', href: '' }, ], help: [ { name: 'FAQ', href: '/FAQ' }, { name: 'Contact Us', href: '/contact' }, ], legal: [ { name: 'Privacy', href: process.env.REACT_APP_PRIVACY }, { name: 'Terms', href: process.env.REACT_APP_TERMS }, ], social: [ { name: 'Facebook', href: 'https://www.facebook.com/everaiseacademy/?ref=py_c', icon: (props) => ( ), }, { name: 'Twitter', href: 'https://twitter.com/EveraiseAcademy', icon: (props) => ( ), }, { name: 'Email', href: 'https://everaise.org/contact-us/', icon: (props) => ( ), }, { name: 'Discord', href: 'https://discord.gg/JE5TaCrrFn', icon: (props) => ( ), }, { name: 'LinkedIn', href: 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/everaise-academy/mycompany/', icon: (props) => ( ), }, ], } export default function Footer() { const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); function submitEmail(event) { event.preventDefault() database.emails.doc(email).set({ email: email }) setEmail('') } return (
